name: Fluttering Away
description:
This game was created for the weekly bitsy jam Trash. 

It is a blustery day, and you are trash on the run. Enjoy the world to its fullest, little paper crumple. 

CONTROLS: 

  • W, A, S, D on desktop
  • Swipe on mobile
  • Bump objects to interact with them 

If you enjoy the game, please consider leaving a rating or comment so I know you enjoyed it. Thank you for playing!
